Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.23946320] Gram-positive bacteria :Bacillus subtilis(MIC=2 mg/L), Enterococcus faecalis(MIC=2 mg/L), Micrococcus luteus(MIC=2 mg/L), Staphylococcus aureus(MIC=2 mg/L);Gram-negative bacteria :Escherichia coli(MIC=4 mg/L), Pseudomonas aeruginosa(MIC=2 mg/L), Salmonella typhimurium(MIC=4 mg/L);Fungi :Candida albicans(MIC=2 mg/L), Cryptococcus neoformans(MIC=2 mg/L), Saccharomyces cerevisiae(MIC=4 mg/L)
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: [Ref.23946320] 0% hemolysis at 140 mg/L against human red blood cells
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: [Ref.23946320] The cell viability of hPBMCs is 102.6%, 102.6%, 107.9%, 96.8% and 97.9% at peptide concentrations of 4, 8, 16, 32, 64 Î¼g/ml
Sequence Information.Function: Antibacterial activity against Gram-positive bacteria and Gram-negative bacteria. Antifungal activity against Candida albicans, Cryptococcus neoformans, Saccharomyces cerevisiae

Literature.Title: De novo generation of short antimicrobial peptides with enhanced stability and cell specificity
Literature.Author: Hyun Kim, Ju Hye Jang, Sun Chang Kim and Ju Hyun Cho
